title: Show Us Your Replays Contest, Sponsored by Logitech

replies.body:

sorry for the spam did you get this submission?
Yes :)
just double checking even though its been 3 weeks haha did you guys get this submission
report yasuo for ks
# # O C E B I G P L A Y S
Why have there been a lot of stuff like this but only for the Oceanic region? I'm not part of it but would like to participate in stuff like this

Every region tries to do really cool shit for their players, whether its content or contests. All regions are different though, which is why Riot trusts the local teams there to both brainstorm and implement these kinds of things.  It just so happens that sometimes a region will come up with a really baller idea for their players that also resonates no matter where you play such as this replay contest.  When that happens, teams like ours might want to shamelessly steal that idea to let even more players show us what they got. By the sounds of it, we might need to fill this gap here in NA if there's a lot of interest from players!

I've got a month to make a 'faker play' on Janna :) Can't wait for you all to see it :D

Time to flash and go in for an insec on Janna xDD (in ranked ofc ^.^).

GL to everyone !!! 

I can't wait to see your cool plays :DD

P.s @Riot, can we view other peoples entries for the 'PogChamp' reactions or the 'BOOSTED' plays :?
Does the highlight become ineligible for the contest if most of the interface (score, items, team health, etc.) is toggled off?

What constitutes as a "good play", other than a penta-kill or a clutch Baron steal?

How would support players be looked at?

Support example
https://youtu.be/8G2hOF3zAcE?t=33s

just something i got when i was messing around, jeez i know right aram >->
https://youtu.be/0PrLjQ1JwrM
Dat QUADRA doe

Question: The replay I downloaded has terrible audio (weird noises). I wish to replace the audio to something which is reasonable. The guidelines do not allow any edit of the video. Can I edit the audio?
You have the option of removing the audio, but your gameplay will be at a disadvantage.

So I cant add any audio but I can remove the original audio? Also, how does this work with streams that only have music playing with no game sounds? Do we still remove the audio if it was a part of stream?
No "out of game" music playing. We don't want Gragas, Esq. writing us any cease and desist letters!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Every time I try to save the replay in the client, it crashes. Am I allowed to record the replay using a third-party programs like OBS?
As long as you're meeting the contest rules, that is fine.

I just had a quick question about the replay. I've got a replay that I want to submit but in the recording I skip a bit of the video to show what I've wanted to show. I don't have the original replay anymore so I can't rerecord the play. Should i leave the video as a whole or cut it out?

I'm not sure if I understand. You say you skipped a bit, and that you don't have the original. But then you ask if you should leave the whole video or cut it out :? I'm confused. The first part says you don't have the original, while the second part sounds like you do?

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

I have several tasty treats, but out of respect for my fellow summoners I turn off names... also like in Fincher's Facebook movie... when the Napster guy tells Zucks that losing the "The" is cleaner... I also find playing without names much cleaner... BUT because the ones I think are worthy are from last season... I wont be able to do the whole Summoner Name thingy... What should I do... as video editing my summoner name onto my play appears to be out of the question.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

I have a question, I have a clip saved on my account from back in 2016 but the funny thing was what the enemy did to me (or didn't do to me) which category would I put this clip under? {{sticker:sg-poppy}}

This is about YOU showcasing YOUR gameplay :)
So if it meets that and the other contest rules, then you're good to enter.

If it's someone else's play and you were a "spectator" of it since you were in the same game, we do not consider that as your replay/gameplay.
If we have a smurf are we able to submit clips made there as an entry there as well?

Yes, but if it wins, the prize will go to your smurf account (i.e. the RP).

Also note, that we are only accepting ONE ENTRY per category per player. Therefore make it count!
That kinda sucks, looking back through all my 'plays' so many of them are on a smurf, and I don't want RP going to an account I rarely play on

I have several questions:

1. Does it have to be in the current patch? I have an amazing 1v5 Penta clip from URF. 

2. "*Your entry must not be modified in any way with a video editor*". Does this include reviewing the clip again in slow motion and explaining *why* it had its merits (ie. it might be hard to see why a Soraka play was Faker-level). 

3. What if you record the replay in slow-mo *inside* the replay feature?

4. "*Your entry must be at least 10 seconds long*". What if it's several one-shots in a matter of 3 seconds?

5. "*Your entry can't include any logos, ...*". Does that include the League of Legends logo or our own personal logo? What if a TSM Emote appears part way through?

I think that's about it :D

1. It does not have to be in the current patch
2. It must not be modified in any way, including slow motion. If you have to explain it, is it really that good/funny? :P
3. It must not be modified in any way.
4. The video clip you submit must be at least 10 seconds long, this allows for the video to be shoutcasted if it is chosen as a winner.
5. Emotes are part of the game, that is fine, example an TSM emote. Your personal logo should not be in the video. Your entry will be invalid if that is the case.

Thanks for the quick response ❤ 

All of those answers make sense. Thanks ❤  ❤  ❤
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I wanted to submit one of my plays so i clicked on submission form but then it says that the promotion ended.. is there any ways i can upload it?

Unfortunately, this contest has already ended. 

> The contest submission period starts today and ends on 15th October 2017 at 11:59PM AEDT.

Keep your eyes peeled for future events!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N5B54SmVRdk&feature=youtu.be is this a valid entry, and if possible could i edit the start where i wasnt moving to press the button thing or something.
Hey I was wondeirng if you guys could remove my first submission, I didn't name the highlight files and submitted the wrong one. Thanks (It's the 15 sec one that's wrong)

Hi my entry has extremely low volume, but still has sound. 
Does that still count?

so i submitted a submission but could u delete it please, because im not sure if im allowed to cut the start where it was paused so i could click record. so please delete my submission and allow me to do it again for the show us ur replays in pro plays, and tell me if i could just cut the start using youtube editor thing. Thanks
Unbanned ?
if i submit another entry in the same category, does it replace the one i already sent

No. It will disqualify you because it goes against the contest rules, "You can only enter each category once (Pro Plays & Not So Pro Plays)".

If we didn't do this, it would open up all players to submit an unlimited number of entries since it would just be "replaced".

If I have a replay of me 1v5ing the entire enemy team in a norms as they attempt to 5v1 me, and i get a penta off of it due to their... let's just say inability... would that be a pro play or not so pro play? I myself feel like it'd be the latter, because I cringed every single moment of it. .3.
Not saying anyone could do what I did there, but saying it was pretty easy for me, playing my main. >.>
im pretty sure the not so pro play only talks about ur self doing the not so gud play not other poeple doing bad
can i compile multiple similar plays from the same game?
No, this would involve using a video editor to compile the plays, which goes against the contest rules.
